post:
**ModulesGarden Proxmox VPS For WHMCS** allows you to automatically provision virtual servers to your customers who can manage them directly from your WHMCS client area. Module also contains Proxmox Addon where you can monitor & manage your servers, IP addresses and clusters.

Version 1.3 contains many new features and improvements made according to your requests and our own ideas. 

Tomorrow we will release **Proxmox Cloud For WHMCS 1.1** with many new functionalities too. Keep your eye on our social networks where we will present more details.


**Changelog:**

- New Feature: Integration with IP Manager For WHMCS
- New Feature: Backups routing
- New Feature: New configurable options : 'IPv6 Address', 'VM Template' and 'ISO Image'
- New Feature: KVM templates creation from Proxmox For WHMCS addon
- New Feature: Assignment of IP addresses to selected virtualization at the Proxmox For WHMCS addon
- New Feature: Task history
- New Feature: Node name at the client area
- New Feature: Synchronize templates
- New Feature: Change hostname (OpenVZ virtualization)
- New Feature: Cron (boot of recently created VM and reinstall of VM from template)
- New Feature: VLAN Tags (KVM virtualization)
- New Feature: Custom IP address for console
- Changed: Graph moved to a separate page at the client area
- Changed: Configurable option name from 'IP Addresses' to 'IPv4 Addresses'
- Fixed: Missing backups after reinstallation
- Fixed: 'Authentication' replacing 'Access Hash' at other modules
- Fixed: Backup jobs & sheduled tasks not removed during VM termination
- Minor bug fixes


**Admin Area Features:**

- Create Server 
- Suspend/Unsuspend Server 
- Terminate Server 
- Change Package (Supports Configurable Options) 
- Boot Server 
- Reboot Server 
- Stop Server 
- Reinstall Server 
- View Server Status, Details And Statistics 
- View Graphs (With Ability To Change The Time Scale of MRTG Graphs) 
- Display Disk And Bandwidth Usage Of Each Product 
- VNC Console Access 
- Auto Node - Possibility To Automatically Create VM On The Node With The Most Free Space 
- Possibility To Import IP To Hosting IP Addresses Table 
- Possibility To Return IP To IP Addresses Pool 
- Possibility To Add Additional IP To VM 
- Configuration Of Features Available At The Client Area  

**Proxmox Addon Features:**

- Servers List 
- IP Management (Per Server) 
- Clusters (Per Server) 
- KVM Templates 

**Client Area Features:**

- Boot Server 
- Reboot Server 
- Stop Server 
- Shutdown Server 
- Reinstall Server 
- VNC Console 
- Create Backups 
- Restore Backups 
- Backups Routing 
- Backup Jobs 
- Task History 
- Backup Files & Job Limits (Max Number Of Files & Max Size Of Files)
- View Server Status, Details And Statistics 
- View Graphs (With Ability To Change The Time Scale of MRTG Graphs) 
- Display Disk And Bandwidth Usage 
- Easy Product Upgrade/Downgrade 

**Additionally:**

- Supports PVE And PAM Autentication 
- Dynamically Chosen Server Resources While Ordering And Possibility To Upgrade Those Resources 
- Integrated With Advanced Billing For WHMCS - Server Resource Usage Billing [(read more)](http://www.modulesgarden.com/products/whmcs/advanced_billing/features)
- Integrated With IP Manager For WHMCS – Complete Management of IP Pools [(read more)](http://www.modulesgarden.com/products/whmcs/ip_manager/features)
- Multi-Language Support 
- Supports Proxmox VE 3 and Later 
- Supports IPv4 and IPv6 
- Supports WHMCS V5 and Later 

**Available Configurable Options For KVM:**
